summary: A meek tailor thinks his wooing will be helped if he assumes the identity of the famous Casanova...who's deeply in debt.
cast: Bob Hope|Joan Fontaine|Audrey Dalton|Basil Rathbone|Hugh Marlowe|Arnold Moss|John Carradine|John Hoyt|Hope Emerson|Robert Hutton|Lon Chaney Jr.|Raymond Burr|Frieda Inescort|Primo Carnera|Frank Puglia|Paul Cavanagh|Romo Vincent|Henry Brandon|Natalie Schafer|Douglas Fowley|Nestor Paiva|Lucien Littlefield|Eric Alden|John Alderson|Oliver Blake|Charles Cooley|Gino Corrado|John Doucette|Dan Dowling|Trippe Elan|Marla English|Fritz Feld|Bess Flowers|Barbara Freking|Kathryn Grant|Joe Gray|Chuck Hicks|Arline Hunter|Richard Karlan|Walter Kingsford|Skelton Knaggs|Edith Leslie|Torben Meyer|Paul Newlan|Vincent Price|Keith Richards|Michael Ross|Dick Sands|Joan Shawlee|Rexene Stevens|Joseph Vitale|Max Wagner|Anthony Warde|Paul Wexler
title: La gran noche de Casanova
